title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Mix everything and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and spices.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A simple and healthy breakfast with smashed avocado, salt, and pepper on toasted bread.
instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Mash the avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Spread the avocado mixture on toast.
